snippet: Tech company stocks, which had fallen since the election, jumped as the Dow Jones industrial average set another record high and banks traded at their highest levels since early 2008....
abstract: Stocks rise with banks, energy and technology earning biggest gains.
lead_paragraph: Tech company stocks, which had fallen since the election, jumped as the Dow Jones industrial average set another record high and banks traded at their highest levels since early 2008.

headline.main: Technology Companies Join Market’s Postelection Rally
